content.question: A circuit is constructed with the battery, inductor, switch, and three identical resistors shown. The switch is initially open and then is closed. Which of the following expressions best represents the energy stored in the inductor after the switch has been closed for a very long time?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction L times V squared over 8 times R squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>L</mi><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction L times V squared over 18 times R squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>L</mi><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction L times V squared over 2 times R squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>L</mi><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 9 L times V squared over 2 times R squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>L</mi><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction L times V squared over 18 times R squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>L</mi><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
